summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MASAL SEPETİ Turkish educational children's story platform. All backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend fully functional with all required features working correctly. AI story generation (critical feature) working excellently.
passed_tests: GET /api/topics returns 15 categories with correct structure
GET /api/topics/{topic_id} returns topic detail with subtopics and kazanım
GET /api/stories returns stories list (empty is fine)
AI Story Generation (POST /api/stories/generate) - CRITICAL TEST PASSED
Homepage displays 15 topic cards in grid layout
Topic detail page shows subtopics with kazanım
Story create page loads topic dropdown with 15 options
Story create page shows subtopics when topic is selected
Kazanım is displayed when subtopic is selected
